column1: [T],thetorrentlord,2011-06-18T18:50Z,This movie was released with French audio. How did you get an English audio track?

[T],thetorrentlord,2011-06-23T17:51Z,"You picked a poor choice for the sample, as it has absolutely no spoken words in the whole sample. My sample was also full of dropouts. Anyone else have the same problems with this file??"

[T],thetorrentlord,2011-08-06T07:54Z,"Just finished the D/L and the audio is not in English. There is only one audio track and it is not English. MKV info does not identify the language. ((MKVInfo) + EBML head at 0
